SELECT
(CASE WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%生产' THEN '生产' END) as section, SC_PART as part,SC_CONTENT as content ,RESULT as result,ALTPID as level FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(TASKSTART_TM)
AND ((DEPT_NAME='精尾设备' AND devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（硫浓密）' and SC_PART in ('减速机、液压控制泵站','行走轮及链条')) OR (DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机1号（行走）') OR (DEPT_NAME='精尾生产' AND devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（硫浓密）' AND SC_PART in ('行走轮' ,'减速机、液压控制泵站' ,'齿轮链条') ))
AND ((DEPT_NAME='精尾设备' AND devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（硫浓密）' and SC_PART in ('耙架提升油缸','中心柱轴承')) OR (DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND devName='硫45m浓密油泵电机2号（提耙）') OR (DEPT_NAME='精尾生产' AND devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（硫浓密）' AND SC_PART='耙架提升机') )
AND ((DEPT_NAME='精尾设备' AND devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（硫浓密）' and SC_PART in ('消泡泵','自助加油泵','其它')) OR (DEPT_NAME='精尾生产' AND devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（硫浓密）' AND SC_PART in ('三相异步电机' ,'压力表' ,'其它') ))
ORDER BY FIELD(section,'设备','电仪','生产'),part

SELECT
(CASE WHEN DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' THEN '电仪' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%设备' THEN '设备' WHEN DEPT_NAME LIKE '%生产' THEN '生产' END) as section, SC_PART as part,SC_CONTENT as content ,RESULT as result,ALTPID as level FROM dxj_spot_result WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW())=TO_DAYS(TASKSTART_TM)
and ((DEPT_NAME='精尾设备' and devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（事故浓密）' AND SC_PART !='行走轮及链条' ) OR (DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' and devName='18m浓密池提耙电机'))
and ((DEPT_NAME='精尾设备' and devName='NJG型周边传动浓缩机（事故浓密）' AND SC_PART ='行走轮及链条' ) OR (DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' and devName='18m浓密池行走电机'))
and DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND ZONE_NAME='浓密机NJG-18' and devName='1#离心式渣浆泵电机'
and DEPT_NAME='精尾设备' and devName='1#离心式渣浆泵（底流）'
and DEPT_NAME='电仪工段' AND ZONE_NAME='浓密机NJG-18' and devName='2#离心式渣浆泵电机'
and DEPT_NAME='精尾设备' and devName='2#离心式渣浆泵（底流）'
ORDER BY FIELD(section,'设备','电仪','生产'),part
